name: Makkari
aliases: Mike Khary, Frank Harper, Mark Curry, Jake Curtiss, Major Mercury,  Hurricane Mercury , Adam Clayton, Mac Curry, Michael Gray, Thoth
powersText:

Immortality
Superhuman speed, strength and durability

Currently:
Immortality
Superhuman strength and speed
Ability to communicate with the Dreaming Celestial
